practice_phrases: Along the main road.
沿着主路。
I can see mountains along the main road.
我能沿着主路看到山。
She followed me along the main road.
她沿着主路跟着我。
I saw the bus along the main road.
我沿着主路看到公交车。
She told me to leave along the main road.
她告诉我沿着主路离开。
I can see the station along the main road.
我能沿着主路看到车站。
Every morning I wake up and see mountains along the main road.
每天早上我醒来沿着主路看到山。
She used to always insist we leave home along the main road.
她过去总是坚持我们沿着主路离开家。
I just saw the last bus leaving along the main road.
我刚看到最后一班公交车沿着主路离开。
And along the main road.
沿着主路。
Main road.
主路。
I can see the main road.
我能看到主路。
She told me about the main road.
她告诉我主路。
I saw the bus on the main road.
我看到公交车在主路上。
I can see mountains from the main road.
我能从主路看到山。
She followed me to the main road.
她跟着我到主路。
Every morning I wake up and see the main road.
每天早上我醒来看到主路。
I just saw the last bus leaving the station on the main road.
我刚看到最后一班公交车在主路上离开车站。
She used to always insist we leave home and go to the main road.
她过去总是坚持我们离开家到主路去。
I can see the main road from my bedroom window.
我能从我的卧室窗户看到主路。
